Pinterest is a tool to find your inspiration and share it with others. Use it to collect things you love, organize and plan important projects, and more. Features • Pin images from around the web • Explore Pins and boards you’re interested in • Get inspiration from DIY, Travel, Food and other categories • Pin with your camera Why do we require a particular permission? https://help.pinterest.com/entries/21865478#permissions Photos in screenshots licensed under Creative Commons: http://passets-cdn.pinterest.com/android-attribution.txt
To access your contacts, please update your settings

—Invite friends to Pinterest by text or email —Invite, accept or block people from your group boards

• Pin around the world: now available in more languages! • New context menu lets you Pin, like and share more quickly

"Deactivating means no one will see your Pins or anything else in your Pinterest profile. You also won't be linked to %1$s. You can come back any time."
Deactivating means no one will see your Pins or anything else in your Pinterest profile, but other Pinners will still be able to see any messages you sent to them. You can come back any time.

If you disconnect Facebook, you will not be able to login with Facebook. To log in to Pinterest you will have to use your email on file and your current password.
If you disconnect Google, you will not be able to login with Google. To log in to Pinterest you will have to use your email and password.
If you disconnect Rakuten, you will not be able to login with Rakuten. To log in to Pinterest you will have to use your email on file and your current password.
If you disconnect Twitter, you will not be able to login with Twitter. To log in to Pinterest you will have to use your email on file and your current password.
Discover ideas for all your projects and interests
